name: getgems
description: GetGems NFT marketplace integration — browse collections, search NFTs, view trading stats, buy/sell/cancel listings. GraphQL-based with full gift collection support.
author: Kloveren (t.me/morganlegacy)

tools.name: getgems_collection_info
tools.description: Get collection statistics: floor price, volume, holders, items count

tools.name: getgems_collection_items
tools.description: List NFTs in a collection with filters

tools.name: getgems_items_onsale
tools.description: Get NFTs currently listed for sale with price sorting

tools.name: getgems_nft_history
tools.description: Transaction history for a specific NFT

tools.name: getgems_owner_nfts
tools.description: All NFTs owned by a wallet address

tools.name: getgems_user_trading
tools.description: User trading statistics — volume, P&L, buy/sell counts

tools.name: getgems_buy_nft
tools.description: Buy an NFT listed for sale (on-chain transaction)

tools.name: getgems_list_nft
tools.description: List an NFT for fixed-price sale
